attributes.action: Vaccination for critically ill and save them from death.
attributes.additional_details:
Government to allow approval to inject Vaccines and other relevant treatment which are undergoing Phase III Trials to COVID-19 Patients who are seriously ill.

They might still die due to Vaccine not working.Is that not better than dying without any Vaccine

Every life is important and we as human beings should not decide whom to save and whom to let die.

#savelives #staysafestayhealthy
attributes.background:
Is the US President's life more important than an avg Joe? 
If he can be injected and recover from COVID-19 in a matter of days, why not for people who are critically ill and dying. Are their lives not important?

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Treatment decisions in the UK are a matter for the NHS and not the UK Government.

Vaccinations are used to prevent people from catching and developing illnesses, rather than treating them. You can find out more here:

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/vaccinations/why-vaccination-is-safe-and-important/
